properties.areaDesc: Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 8 at 3:24PM CST until February 10 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Houston/Galveston TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas of 4 to 5 feet this evening building to 5 to 8 feet.
Southeasterly winds increasing to around 20 knots toward
morning.

* WHERE...Waters from Freeport to Matagorda Ship Channel TX from
20 to 60 NM and Waters from High Island to Freeport TX from 20
to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 2 AM Sunday to midnight CST Sunday night.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM SUNDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST SUNDAY NIGHT
